channel.title: Client Problem(2 little problems i think)
channel.description:
If this topic already excist i'm sorry.
Ok, if i run a client (downloaded with a server for it for my own server) it loads... Till 'Connecting to update server' then it stops there. I dont know whats wrong? And another problem is: If i run a client it ask me in the begin for a IP so i have to type my IP or my NO-IP Link in it how do i stop this and make it like automaticly connect to my IP or NO-IP Link?
Much thanks! ~Psyko.

item.title: Client Problem(2 little problems i think)
item.dc:creator: @psyko psyko
item.description:
@psyko wrote:

well ukeys or update keys dont say something to me either.
is the portforwardign my problem? :o i hope not cuz i cant login in my router and my computer is like the ‘head’ computer of the 2 others we have here 2 computers one of mine one of my dad and my mother got a laptop with cableless internet connection and mine is ‘heah’ off all i dotn know if that make difference but my computer goes to my modem and my modem to the company and the router goes another wat like from modem to that other 2 computers.

i dont know whats wrong

Read full topic
item.source: Client Problem(2 little problems i think)

item.title: Client Problem(2 little problems i think)
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

YOU have to connect to 127.0.0.1 if the copmuter your logging in from is the computer the server is running on. And My bad, not XTEA keys, that’s map dayd, I meant uKeys, or updateKeys.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Problem(2 little problems i think)
item.dc:creator: @psyko psyko
item.description:
@psyko wrote:

well the serber was on,XTEA keys? dont say annything to me, i guess its in the correct section? i tried david scape etc. Well i dope hope it is my port forwarding cuz i cant logon to my ‘192.168.1.1’ thing my mother once changed the password but doesnt work annymore and the standard one either its a Lynksys or something one but i really dont hope thats the problem.

thanks btw

Read full topic
item.source: Client Problem(2 little problems i think)

item.title: Client Problem(2 little problems i think)
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

When it get stuck at connecting to update server on the loading screen, then the server isn’t running. If it is, and it still says that, probably wrong XTEA keys. If all that fails, make sure the cache is in the correct section.

Read full topic
